about_the_game:
If you're tired of the motionless pictures on your desktop, if you're ready to welcome the magic of various places around the world and even parallel universes, we have gathered the best live wallpapers in this app! The variety of themes, seasons, and festive scenes are sure to appeal to you. They say beauty demands sacrifice but you don't need to worry because the smart energy-saving settings will slow down the wallpaper if you need your computer to work at full capacity or if your notebook is running low on power. So sit back comfortably and relax - the wonders are already on your screen! And we continue creating new ones.

Features:
  • Large, constantly updated, collection of highly artistic, well-developed 3D scenes
  • Convenient search by tags and playlist creation
  • Full control over the order and period of wallpaper change
  • Instant switching to screensaver mode and exit by password
  • Support for monitors with any resolution and aspect ratio, up to ultra-wide-angle and multi-monitor systems
  • Save disk space - quick installation and removal of scenes in one click
  • Smart system load control and power saving

All previously bought and currently installed screen savers from 3Planesoft will be detected and will become automatically available in Screen Wonders.
detailed_description:
If you're tired of the motionless pictures on your desktop, if you're ready to welcome the magic of various places around the world and even parallel universes, we have gathered the best live wallpapers in this app! The variety of themes, seasons, and festive scenes are sure to appeal to you. They say beauty demands sacrifice but you don't need to worry because the smart energy-saving settings will slow down the wallpaper if you need your computer to work at full capacity or if your notebook is running low on power. So sit back comfortably and relax - the wonders are already on your screen! And we continue creating new ones.

Features:

  • Convenient search by tags and playlist creation
  • Full control over the order and period of wallpaper change
  • Instant switching to screensaver mode and exit by password
  • Support for monitors with any resolution and aspect ratio, up to ultra-wide-angle and multi-monitor systems

name: Screen Wonders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10.0.14393 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 370 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: A collection of the best 3D screensavers and live wallpapers is now available to you in one click. There you will find both scenes that have become classics over the past 20 years and our newest releases. Let the magic come to your screens and enjoy!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese
